item.A:

traditional: 財
money; wealth; riches; property; valuables

traditional: 氣泡
qìpāo bubble
shuǐpào bubble; blister

traditional: 燈泡
dēngpào light bulb; same as 電燈泡|电灯泡
kōngpāo vacuole
qǐpāo yeastiness

traditional: 電燈泡
diàndēngpào light bulb; (slang) unwanted third guest
diàndēngpāo bulb

traditional: 日漸
rìjiàn to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day; more (or better etc) with each passing day

traditional: 漸次
jiàncì gradually; one by one

traditional: 漸漸
jiànjiàn gradually

traditional: 漸變
jiànbiàn gradual change

traditional: 漸進
jiànjìn progress step by step; gradual progress; to move forward (slowly)

traditional: 鋼刀
gāngdāo steel knife; sword

traditional: 鋼材
gāngcái steel (as raw material); steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc

traditional: 鋼板
gāngbǎn steel plate

traditional: 鋼琴

traditional: 鋼筆

traditional: 鋼管

traditional: 鋼結構
gāngjiégòu steel-work

traditional: 鋼鐵
gāngtiě steel

traditional: 作廢
zuòfèi to become invalid; to cancel; to delete; to nullify

traditional: 報廢
bàofèi report as worthless; discard as worthless; reject; scrap

traditional: 廢品
fèipǐn production rejects; seconds; scrap; discarded material

traditional: 廢料
fèiliào waste products; refuse; garbage

traditional: 廢棄
fèiqì to discard; to abandon (old ways); to invalidate

traditional: 廢止
fèizhǐ to repeal (a law); to put an end to; abolition; annulled

traditional: 廢物
fèiwù rubbish; waste material; useless person

traditional: 廢紙
fèizhǐ wastepaper

traditional: 廢話
fèihuà nonsense; rubbish; superfluous words

traditional: 廢除
fèichú abolish; abrogate; repeal

lèishuǐ teardrop; tears
